A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A total disappointment. Don’t waste your money. It’s full of bad acting\, plot holes throughout\, ridiculously stupid moments\, lame attempts at humor\, undeveloped characters\, amateur at best editing\, and recycled/reused scenes from the originals. It’s a terrible straight to VHS type movie. Toy commercials are more interesting than this waste of time. Kennedy\, Abrams\, and Johnson have ruined this franchise.
